Tooltip.Passives: Movement Speed cannot be reduced by more than [GetMovementProtection]%.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementPure
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Purge all negative effects. Cannot use while stunned or frozen.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementTeleport
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Teleport yourself and your army to targeted friendly structure.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementPotion
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal [GetHealthBonus]% of your maximum Health.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementAEMana
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: +[GetRegenBonus]% Mana Per Second Aura for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementAERegen
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: +[GetRegenBonus] Health Per Second Aura for [GetDuration] seconds. Any damage will break this effect.\n\nThe effect works only on Demigods.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementManaLeech
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: 100% chance on hit to gain [GetRegenBonus]% of your damage in Mana for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementFreeSpells
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: The cost of all abilities is reduced to 0 for [GetDuration] seconds.

Tooltip.ChanceOnHit: [GetProcChance]% chance on hit to reduce Movement Speed by [GetMovementSpeedReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementFinger
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Fire a beam of searing light at the targeted location, dealing [GetDamage] damage and throwing smaller units into the air.

Tooltip.ChanceOnHit: [GetProcChance]% chance on hit to increase Attack Speed by [GetMovementSpeedReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementMinionMeta
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Minions are infused with divine power, allowing them to knock away smaller units for 10 seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementMinionBuff
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Minions gain +[GetRegenBuff] Health Per Second for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementAEHeal
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal self and all nearby allies for [GetHealthBuff].

ItemBlueprint.Name: AchievementMinionInvis
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Warp to a targeted location, dealing [GetDamage] damage upon entry.

BuffBlueprint.Name: AchievementMinionMetaBuff
BuffBlueprint.Description: Attacks will knock away smaller units.
